name: Irit Dinur
content: Irit Dinur Irit Dinur Publications Courses Students Dept. of Applied Math and Computer Science (Ziskind building, room 247) The Weizmann Institute of Science Rehovot, 76100 ISRAEL Email: [irit.dinur@weizmann.ac.il] Phone: 08-9342828 Fax: 08-9346023 I am a professor of computer science at the Weizmann Institute of Science. My research is in Foundations of Computer Science and in Combinatorics, especially Probabilistically Checkable Proofs, hardness of approximation, and most recently high dimensional expanders. Ongoing: summer course on robust computation, from local to global ICTS workshop on HDX and Codes (Bangalore, April 28 - May 9) Check out the videos from our recent winter school on Expansion in Groups, Combinatorics and Computation
